eventinfo: Complying with state and federal lobbying and PAC regulations is key to building a trusted and successful public affairs program. A fundamental understanding of political involvement compliance is essential for confidently leading your PAC and advocacy programs. One of the country’s most distinguished political law experts will provide a full-day, deep dive of the top legal and compliance issues affecting lobbyists, PAC professionals and grassroots practitioners.

eventinfo: Site visits and facility tours create quality, face-to-face interactions with legislators and community leaders so they can fully understand your organization’s identity and challenges. eventname: Hybrid Workshop: Federal Appropriations vs. Federal Budget 101
eventinfo: Federal appropriations vs. federal budget.  This workshop will cover the ins and outs of the two, how they differ from each other, and why that differentiation matters.  Join us as we drill down into budget resolutions and the annual appropriations cycle. Whether you’re an “approps” and budget expert who’s simply looking for a refresher or new to the space, this workshop is for you!
